item.description:
Saturday night, September 12th, will be THE BERNADETTE"S debut at the Tuscan Oven, located at 544 Main Ave.(Rt. 7) in Norwalk, CT, their phone: (203) 846-4600.

This is new place for them and there're putting our usual call to the troops to come out and support both the band and a new venue bringing "live", 'ol school' dance music to the public! The Tuscan Oven is very nice upscale establishment with a reputation for serving up some very tasty Italian dishes inspired by the cuisine of Tuscany...and they have a very beautiful patio in which they'll be hosting this special live music event...this may very well be the last outdoor nightclub show of the season, so let's all enjoy one of the last weekends of the summer!!! The Tuscan Oven is located in the north end of Norwalk, next door to the Dept. of Motor Vehicles, close to the Rt. 7/Merritt Parkway interchange, with plenty of on site parking. Showtime will be from 9:00 PM to 12:00 AM, show will be out on the patio but may be moved into the restaurant if there's a threat of rain. For directions and info visit their website at: http://www.tuscanoven...
item.how_to_find_us: Will either be outside on the patio or inside if it's raining. Look for Margaret

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: The Bernadette's @ the Tuscan Oven
